name: Battlerite
description: BATTLERITE​ ​is​ ​an​ ​action-packed​ ​team​ ​arena​ ​brawler.​ ​Experience​ ​the​ ​unique​ ​combination​ ​of​ top-down​ ​shooter​ meets​ ​fast-paced​ ​fighting​ ​game and challenge ​friends​ ​and​ foes​ ​in​ ​a​ ​battle​ ​of reaction. The Arena awaits!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or newer Processor: Dual Core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 3000 DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3000 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
